description:
Products don't sell if we don't market them properly. In fact, you may have the most amazing products on the planet yet if no one is buying them then you'll never make money online! Many people have dozens and dozens of informational products yet if they're NOT selling then no one knows they exist. Marketing is essential to online success! This month we will discuss even more about how Press Releases, Marketing, Opt-in Offers, Google Hangouts and more. Understanding how to market a product and/or service is critical to your success.

We will be discussing:

- Headlines that convert when Marketing online
- The Importance of Multiple Opt-in Offers

- Webinars - Why and How to use them in business (and repurposing them)
- How to Use Hashtags to Grow Your Business and WHY you want to include them in your marketing efforts

- How to use video marketing to grow your business outreach (animations and simple videos)
- The importance of using quotes and pictures in your marketing - How to pre-launch a product or service
- Focusing on what works and creating multiple offers (products) to market
AND MORE!
title: The Beginners' Guide: Marketing Online - Passion to Profits
